Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AdminPrincipal_Description: Email address specified here will automatically be added to the list of ACL's. They will effectively receive {DAV:}all privileges, as a protected privilege
LogBody_Description: Enables verbose logging of DAV server responses to sabredav- log file
UseBrowserPlugin_Description: If true, allows for accessing DAV URL from web browser and navigating the account structure and data
UseDigestAuth_Description: If true, enables the use of Digest auth instead of default Basic auth
ExternalHostNameOfDAVServer_Description: Denotes hostname for DAV server access
UseFullEmailForLogin_Description: If true, full email address is used for DAV login; if fals, username part of email address is used
DomainForLoginWithoutEmail_Description: If UseFullEmailForLogin is false, this value denotes domain part of user's email address
